display_name: Apnea Hypopnea Index (Supine): (Apneas with  >= 4% oxygen desaturation + hypopneas with > 50% flow reduction and >= 4% oxygen desaturation) / hours of sleep in supine position from type IV home sleep apnea test
description: Calculated - Summary metric of sleep disordered breathing events.The curent AASM guidelines refer this index to Respiratory Event Index (REI) since sleep is not directly recorded.
